Google Search will surface news, up-to-date details about COVID-19 vaccines - 9to5Google
articles.description: With a new panel, Google Search will surface the most reliable and trustworthy news and information about COVID-19 vaccine efforts.
articles.content: The COVID-19 pandemic continues to rage on, breaking new records with each passing day. On the bright side, though, the first COVID-19 vaccines are on their way to hopefully bring this all to an end.… [+1599 chars]
